name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated QA Engineer with extensive experience in Quality Assurance, I possess strong skills in API testing, automation testing, functional testing, and regression testing. My technical proficiency includes **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Golang**, with a thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and Agile methodologies, including Scrum. 
I am adept at defect tracking and ensuring software quality through meticulous testing practices. My experience includes leveraging **CLI tools** and **logging tools** to enhance application performance and reliability, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
In my previous roles, I have effectively collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions across industries including healthcare and finance. My capabilities also extend to building automated test frameworks, contributing to CI/CD pipelines, and fostering a culture of quality within development teams.
